docs.lead_paragraph: Keith Bogans’s transformation from a rim-running point guard to a reliable jump shooter off the Nets’ bench is another N.B.A. survivor story.

headline.seo: Nets’ Keith Bogans Works From a Corner Office
headline.main: Nets’ Bogans Works From a Corner Office

docs.snippet: A high school named after Jonathan M. Levin, a dedicated teacher killed by a former student, has had changes in its student body, and it is expected to be closed....
docs.lead_paragraph: A high school named after Jonathan M. Levin, a dedicated teacher killed by a former student, has had changes in its student body, and it is expected to be closed.
docs.abstract: New York City is preparing to shut down a high school named after Jonathan M Levin, dedicated teacher killed by former student; school's impending closure, prompted by its failure to offer a quality education, offers opportunity to weigh arguments for education reform efforts across country, which have focused on closing schools that fail to deliver and replacing them with new ones.

headline.seo: Jonathan Levin High School, Named With Hope, Is Expected to Be Closed
headline.main: Born as a Tribute but Faltering, a Bronx School Nears Its End
headline.print_headline: Born as a Tribute but Faltering, A Bronx School Nears Its End
